title: Is there a map of runeterra?
body:
Just curious to know what countries border on each other etc, obviously while not connected the shadow isles are just off the coast of bilgewater, but thats about as much as I know, the 'shuriman' coast was mentioned, so despite being largely desert it must contact the ocean at some point. 
The feljiord is described as being 'north' which is to be expected. But where do Zaun and piltover reside? Are they cities in demacia/noxus or do they have their own lands? What about Ionia? Im guessing it borders on noxus/zaun because they have wars between the countries. 

The lore stories have peaked my interest, and I'd like to try my hand at writing my own at some point.

replies.body:
yes there is a rough map. I think it was in Braum's lore when i saw it first.

http://img.wikia.nocookie.net/intmap_tile_set_738/thumb/20140728092924%21phpwBA8KT.jpg/680x382x5-20140728092924%21phpwBA8KT.jpg

I'm going to say that map is no longer canon because of the fact the shadow isles is literally on the other side of the map, and it's probably not a world map because I can't see lands like Lokfar.

Anyway, if there wasn't any land past the map, the sea on both sides should have the same name

it never says the shadow isles were near bilgewater, but it did say last season that it came over from the conquerors sea in the west, so in theory, the map is right and the shadow isles corruption just travels around the ocean till it gets to bilgewater
It's odd how the black mist skips over noxus, Ionia, urtisan, demacia, shurima and freljord, and instead travels so far across the sea... I mean, why go so far?
because they get the biggest reap from bilgewater? It's in disarray, sure to attract unwanted attention seeing its weak atm, because "gangplank" "died".
Is this up to date? Because, I can't see where Summoners Rift is located.
> "Summoner's Rift is located in a remote forest between Freljord, and the Ironspike Mountains."
mount gargantuan is mount targon just fyi (leona, diana, panth)

I'm pretty sure shore in a desert refers to an oasis, but I'd need the exact quote to be able to tell.

Ionia always seemed like an island ish place and I knew because of a map I saw. I didn't know Bilgewater was though, I thought it was part of the coastline

> [{quoted}](name=TeCoolMage,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=cgAN4FVp,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2015-11-03T13:49:14.916+0000)
>
> I didn't know Bilgewater was though, I thought it was part of the coastline

read the stories much?
Yes... All I got from it was Bilgewater has traders, and a few harbors.
There was a map in the old Journal of Justice which I think is the one BB posted. However I'm fairly sure after all the progression of lore and champions that the old map is now out dated and wrong.
